hero_image.alt: Hero image for Vibration Monitoring Software: How to Move from "What Happened?" to "What Will Happen?"

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic shot inside a modern, clean manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a reliability engineer (wearing a hard hat, safety glasses, and a high-visibility vest) is looking at a tablet held in their left hand (back of tablet visible, no screen content). Their right hand is gesturing toward a large industrial electric motor that has a small, wireless orange vibration sensor attached to the cooling fin. In the background, out of focus, another technician is inspecting a conveyor line. The lighting is cool industrial blue with warm highlights on the machinery. No text or overlays. High resolution, 8k.
